item.title: Alibaba Cloud Official Vector Icons and draw.io Custom Libraries
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: I collected a complete set of Alibaba Cloud vector icons and generated the draw.io icon library.

item.title: Use git-crypt to encrypt files in Git
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: git-crypt is a tool for encrypting and decrypting files that integrates seamlessly with Git repositories, allowing users to securely store and share sensitive data.

item.title: Lightweight Kubernetes Distributions Practices
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: Deploying and managing native Kubernetes clusters is a complex task. To address this issue, the community has provided lightweight Kubernetes distributions as a solution.

item.title: What are Private IP Addresses
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: In the Internet addressing architecture, the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) have reserved various IP addresses for special purposes.

item.title: Enhance AWS S3 Data Security with Bucket Level Policy
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: After restricting the source of S3 Bucket access requests through Bucket Level Policy, the data in AWS S3 Bucket can still be secured even if AKSK is compromised.

item.title: Setup Kubernetes Cluster Using kubeadm
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: kubeadm performs the actions necessary to get a minimum viable cluster up and running.

item.title: Solutions and Insights
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: Here are some of my personal bookmarks about technology solutions and insights.

item.title: Python OpenCV CAPTCHA Recognition in Action
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: The recognition principles and processes I have learned from the CAPTCHA recognition are really valuable.

item.title: DevOps CI/CD Pipeline in Action
item.author: Dong Guo | Damon
item.description: There are differences in the most appropriate CI/CD pipelines in different environments, especially the toolchains, but the general process and thinking should be similar.
